si.title: සභාවේ මහ ඇමති ලෙස පත් කරන තීන්ත රත්නායක?
body_lines: අමාත්ය බිමල් රත්නායක පාලක පක්ෂයේ මහ ඇමති ලෙස පත් කිරීමට තීරණය කර තිබේ.

en.title: Pimal Ratnayake appointed as the Chief Minister of the Council?
body_lines: It has been decided to appoint Minister Bimal Ratnayake as the chief minister of the ruling party.

summary_lines: Pimal Ratnayake named Chief Minister of Council. Bimal Ratnayake chosen as leader of ruling party.
